import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { withRouter } from 'react-router-dom' import Modal from "react-bootstrap/Modal" import Select from 'react-select'; function IssuesForm({ issue, postIssue, users, edit, projects, patchIssue, issueId, setIssueId, errors, show, setShow, removeError }) { const initialState = { title: undefined, description: undefined, targetEndDate: undefined, project: undefined, assignedUsers: undefined, priority: "low", status: "open", type: "bugs/error", } const [state, setState] = useState(initialState) const handleClose = () => { setShow(false); setState(initialState) setIssueId("") removeError() } useEffect(() => { if (edit && issue) { const newDateString = new Date(issue.targetEndDate).toISOString().split('T')[0] setState({ ...issue, targetEndDate: newDateString, project: issue.project._id, user: issue.createdBy._id }) } }, [issue, setIssueId, edit]) const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() switch (e.target.name) { case "create": postIssue(state) .then(res => handleClose()) break case "edit": patchIssue(issueId, state) break default: return } } const projectOptions = projects.map((project, i) => { return }) const userOptions = users.map((user, i) => ( { label: user.username, value: user.username } )) console.log(userOptions) const handleChange = (e, event) => { console.log(e.target) console.log(value) // setState({ ...state, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } return (
{edit ? "Edit Issue" : "Create Issue"}
{/* */} {projectOptions}

) } export default withRouter(IssuesForm)
